title: WTB: Chase trophy and pink port.
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTB: Chase trophy and pink port.
posts.post_content: Looking for a grade of 5.5 or higher.....

Good luck on the Chase Pink. I have followed that card very closely over the last 5 or 6 years.

That card is IMPOSSIBLE to find in a 5 or higher.

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1610291]Good luck on the Chase Pink. I have followed that card very closely over the last 5 or 6 years.

That card is IMPOSSIBLE to find in a 5 or higher.[/QUOTE]

Are you serious? I have owned this card in a straight 7 and a 6.5. I sold both of these cards in the last three or four years....I regret selling the 7, but they are out there. To say it's near impossible to find a 5 or higher is somewhat crazy....If I'm not mistaken, there are two PSA 5's right now on Ebay...

Deadly. Those are 4s in a 5 holder. The corners are not strong enough to qualify for a new 5.

Yes. I own 1, maybe even the one 7 you sold.

Additionally, just because they sell doesn't mean you see the sale, or are presented with a private offer to buy the card. I am referring to public sale.

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1610520]Deadly. Those are 4s in a 5 holder. The corners are not strong enough to qualify for a new 5.

Yes. I own 1, maybe even the one 7 you sold.

Additionally, just because they sell doesn't mean you see the sale, or are presented with a private offer to buy the card. I am referring to public sale.[/QUOTE]

They are still 5's... Since you are a Chase expert, and own a 7, how much would you sell it for??
